abstract: State Dept rebukes Israel for soliciting bids to build over 300 housing units in territory surrounding Jerusalem, and calls action 'corrosive' to peace; Palestinians and many in international community deem these Jewish settlements illegal because they are in areas annexed by Israel after 1967 Arab-Israeli war.
lead_paragraph: The State Department reacted strongly to steps to build more than 300 housing units in East Jerusalem, denouncing them as “corrosive to the cause of peace.”

headline.main: U.S. Rebukes Israel Over New Settlement Activity in East Jerusalem
headline.print_headline: Building Plan by Israel ‘Corrosive,’ U.S. Says

snippet: The State Department reacted strongly to steps to build more than 300 housing units in East Jerusalem, denouncing them as “corrosive to the cause of peace.”...
